NAME.Nominative: Tuesday of the Fifth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Tuesday of the Fifth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 3rd Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Our helper is the God of Jacob, and He is our defender in the day of affliction.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: and in troubles from my youth.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O Lord God of my salvation, by day have I cried and by night before Thee.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Blessed is the people that knoweth jubilation.
and Thy salvation do Thou give unto us.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O Lord, in the light of Thy face shall they walk.
